debug_flag.label: Debug
debug_flag.tooltip: This will log requests and responses in /var/log/ops.log
debug_flag.comment: Make sure the global Magento logging is also enabled.

pspid.label: PSPID
pspid.comment: PSPID is a case sensitive field

secret_key_type.label: Hash algorithm
secret_key_type.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the PayEngine backend in section Technical information on tab Global security parameters.

secret_key_in.label: SHA-IN Pass phrase
secret_key_in.comment: Refer to PayEngine's backend in section Technical Information on tab Data and origin verification.
secret_key_in.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the PayEngine backend in section Technical information on tab Data and origin verification.

secret_key_out.label: SHA-OUT Pass phrase
secret_key_out.comment: Refer to PayEngine's backend in section Technical Information on tab Transaction feedback.
secret_key_out.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the PayEngine backend in section Technical information on tab Transaction feedback.

mode.label: Mode
mode.tooltip: Depending on the selection the extension will communicate with the PayEngine test or production service. Choose custom, if you have to use special urls for the gateway.
mode.comment: Please note that, after changing this value, you might also need to update additional fields like API-User and password, PSPID or SHA-IN/OUT pass phrase.

api_userid.label: API User
api_userid.tooltip: Special user for API must be created in the PayEngine backend in section Users.

api_pswd.label: API Password
api_pswd.tooltip: Password which has been set in the PayEngine backend for above API user.

payment_action.label: Payment Action
payment_action.tooltip: This setting will override the configuration in the PayEngine backend in section Technical information on tab Global transaction parameters.

template.label: Payment Template
template.tooltip: For an easier PCI compliance we recommend redirect mode, iFrame mode or dynamic template with the template hosted on PayEngine servers.

template_identifier.label: Template Identifier/Url
template_identifier.tooltip: Enter the TemplateRootId you received from PayEngine or the url to an external template.

txtcolor.label: Text Color of the PayEngine Template

tblbgcolor.label: Table Background Color of the PayEngine Template

tbltxtcolor.label: Table Text Color of the PayEngine Template

buttonbgcolor.label: Button Background Color of the PayEngine Template

buttontxtcolor.label: Button Text Color of the PayEngine Template

fonttype.label: Font Family of the PayEngine Template

logo.label: Logo of the PayEngine Template
logo.comment: URL/filename of the logo. The URL must be absolute and stored on a secure server.

redirectOrderReference.label: Order reference in case of redirect payments
redirectOrderReference.comment: See chapter 'configuration', section 'Magento - Backend in the documentation'. Please note that the option 'orderId' is not used the Kwixo payment methods.

inlineOrderReference.label: Order reference in case of inline payments
inlineOrderReference.comment: See chapter 'configuration', section 'Magento - Backend in the documentation'.

showQuoteIdInOrderGrid.label: Show Quote ID in the order grid

submitExtraParameters.label: Submit extra parameters
submitExtraParameters.tooltip: Only enable this if you wish to use Fraud Detection.
submitExtraParameters.comment: Enable this if you wish to use fraud detection

resendPaymentInfo_template.label: Resend payment information template
resendPaymentInfo_template.tooltip: The email template to use. Choose 'Default Template from Locale' to use PayEngine extensions default template.

device_fingerprinting.label: Enable device fingerprinting
device_fingerprinting.comment: When enabling this, you still need to request the explicit consent of the customer in the checkout to transmit this data.
device_fingerprinting.tooltip: This functionality will transmit specific customer data as hash to PayEngine to identify the device from which the transaction was sent can be identified with the highest probability.

ops_rtimeout.label: Timeout for transactions
ops_rtimeout.comment: This value specifies the request timeout for that transaction. A value between 30 and 60 is possible.

creditdebit_split.label: Credit/Debit card Split
creditdebit_split.tooltip: If activated an extra parameter is transmitted to PayEngine for the Creditcard/Debitcard payment methods.
creditdebit_split.comment: See also PayEngine documentation.

billing_day_month.label: Billing day for monthly subscriptions
billing_day_month.tooltip: Determines the day of the month when a monthly subscription gets triggered.

billing_day_week.label: Billing day for weekly subscriptions
billing_day_week.tooltip: Determines the day of the week when a weekly subscription gets triggered.

suspendSubscription_identity.label: Store contact responsible for subscription handling
suspendSubscription_identity.tooltip: This contact will receive the suspend/cancel requests for the subscriptions. See 'Store Email Adresses'.

suspendSubscription_template.label: E-Mail template for suspending/canceling a subscription
suspendSubscription_template.tooltip: This e-mail template is used for the automatically generated e-mail that is getting sent to the corresponding contact, if a customer wants to cancel a subscription.
